name: Chatbot de contenu de site Web avec Pinecone, Airtable et OpenAI pour les applications RAG
description:
### Ce workflow n8n montre comment **extraire le contenu d'un site Web, l'indexer dans Pinecone et utiliser Airtable pour alimenter un agent de chat pour les questions-r√©ponses des clients**.

Les cas d'utilisation incluent :  
* Construire une **base de connaissances** √† partir de votre site Web.  
* Cr√©er un **chatbot** qui r√©pond aux questions des clients en utilisant le contenu de votre propre site.  
* Alimenter des **workflows RAG** pour les FAQ, les documents de support ou la connaissance des produits.  

---

### Comment √ßa fonctionne
* Le workflow commence par un **d√©clencheur manuel** ou un message de chat.  
* Le contenu du site Web est r√©cup√©r√© via une **demande HTTP**.  
* Le **corps HTML** est extrait et converti en **Markdown** propre.  
* Le texte est divis√© en morceaux (~500 caract√®res avec 50 de chevauchement) √† l'aide du **Diviseur de texte par caract√®res**.  
* Des **embeddings OpenAI** sont g√©n√©r√©s pour chaque morceau.  
* Le contenu et les embeddings sont stock√©s dans **Pinecone** avec s√©paration de namespace.  
* Un **Agent de chat** (aliment√© par OpenAI ou OpenRouter) r√©cup√®re les r√©ponses de Pinecone et Airtable.  
* Un **tampon m√©moire** permet des conversations √† plusieurs tours.  
* Un **outil de facturation** (Airtable) fournit des r√©ponses dynamiques li√©es √† la facturation lorsque n√©cessaire.  

---

### Comment utiliser
* Remplacez l'URL de site Web d'exemple dans le n≈ìud **demande HTTP** par votre propre domaine ou source de contenu. 
* Mettez √† jour le code de normalisation en fonction de la sortie de contenu markdown pour √©liminer le bruit. 
* Ajustez la taille des morceaux dans le **Diviseur de texte** pour la sortie markdown de votre site Web.  
  * Dans cet exemple, le **Diviseur de texte par caract√®res avec le s√©parateur `######`** a tr√®s bien fonctionn√©.  
  * V√©rifiez toujours la **sortie Markdown** pour peaufiner votre logique de division.  
* Mettez √† jour le **namespace Pinecone** pour correspondre √† votre projet.  
* Personnalisez le **prompt syst√®me de l'Agent de chat** pour correspondre √† la voix de votre marque et aux r√®gles de r√©ponse.  
* Connectez-vous √† votre propre **sch√©ma Airtable** si vous souhaitez un acc√®s en direct aux donn√©es de facturation/paiement.  

---

### Exigences
* **Compte OpenAI** (pour les embeddings + mod√®le de chat).  
* **Compte Pinecone** (DB vectoriel pour la recherche s√©mantique).  
* **Compte Airtable** (si vous utilisez l'outil de facturation).  
* (Optionnel) **Compte OpenRouter** (fournisseur de mod√®le de chat alternatif).  
* n8n auto-h√©berg√© ou cloud.  

---

### Besoin d'aide ?  
Demandez dans le [Forum n8n](https://community.n8n.io/) !  

Bonne automatisation ! üöÄ

workflow.name: Build a chatbot on website content and Airtable data for RAG applications

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!  
### This n8n workflow shows how to **extract website content, index it in Pinecone, and leverage Airtable to power a chat agent for customer Q&A**.

Use cases include:  
* Building a **knowledge base** from your website.  
* Creating a **chatbot** that answers customer queries using your own site content.  
* Powering **RAG workflows** for FAQs, support docs, or product knowledge.  

---

### How it works
* Workflow starts with a **manual trigger** or chat message.  
* Website content is fetched via **HTTP Request**.  
* The **HTML body** is extracted and converted into clean **Markdown**.  
* Text is split into chunks (~500 chars with 50 overlap) using the **Character Text Splitter**.  
* **OpenAI embeddings** are generated for each chunk.  
* Content and embeddings are stored in **Pinecone** with namespace separation.  
* A **Chat Agent** (powered by OpenAI or OpenRouter) retrieves answers from Pinecone and Airtable.  
* **Memory buffer** allows multi-turn conversations.  
* A **billing tool** (Airtable) provides dynamic billing-related answers when needed.  

---

### How to use
* Replace the sample website URL in the **HTTP Request** node with your own domain or content source.  
* Adjust chunk size in the **Text Splitter** for your website markdown output.  
  * In this example, the **Character Text Splitter with separator `######`** worked really well.  
  * Always check the **Markdown output** to fine-tune your splitting logic.  
* Update **Pinecone namespace** to match your project.  
* Customize the **Chat Agent system prompt** to fit your brand voice and response rules.  
* Connect to your own **Airtable schema** if you want live billing/payment data access.  

---

### Requirements
* **OpenAI account** (for embeddings + chat model).  
* **Pinecone account** (vector DB for semantic search).  
* **Airtable account** (if using the billing tool).  
* (Optional) **OpenRouter account** (alternative chat model provider).  
* n8n self-hosted or cloud.  

---

### Need Help?  
Ask in the [n8n Forum](https://community.n8n.io/)!  

Happy Automating! üöÄ

parameters.initialMessages: Hi how I can help you.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI-powered assistant designed to support customers with **Billing System Upgrades** and related queries for a data services provider.

---

### Tools

** Knowledge Tool**

* Use the provided FAQ knowledge base (stored in Pinecone) as your **primary source of truth**.

** Billing Tool**

* Use this tool to access **customer billing-related information** when needed.
find by "Billing Account"

---

### Guidelines for Responding

1. **When the knowledge base has a complete answer**

   * Provide the information clearly, concisely, and in a professional yet friendly tone.

2. **When the knowledge base does not contain the answer**

   * Politely let the user know.
   * Direct them to **[https://www.eirevo.ie/contact-us/](https://www.eirevo.ie/contact-us/)** for further assistance.
   * Do **not** invent or guess answers. Only rely on verified sources.

3. **If the user‚Äôs query is incomplete**

   * Ask for clarification or request the missing context before responding.

4. **User message style**

   * Customers may send messages in fragments. Only respond when:

     * The message ends with punctuation, or
     * There is silence for more than 5 seconds.

---

### Formatting Rules

* Always be **professional, friendly, and easy to understand**.
* Provide **only the necessary details**‚Äîavoid unnecessary elaboration.
* Include the contact link **only when no relevant information is available**.

---

### Example Behavior

**Case 1: Answer Found**

* **User:** ‚ÄúHow do I upgrade my billing system?‚Äù
* **Chatbot:** ‚ÄúYou can upgrade your billing system by logging into the portal, selecting *Billing Settings*, and following the upgrade wizard.‚Äù

**Case 2: Answer Not Found**

* **User:** ‚ÄúCan I integrate with a third-party CRM?‚Äù
* **Chatbot:** ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have that information available right now. For further assistance, please visit [our contact page](https://www.eirevo.ie/contact-us/).‚Äù

---

parameters.content:
* Adjust chunk size in the **Text Splitter** for website markdown output.
  * In this example, the **Character Text Splitter with separator `######`** worked really well.  
  * Always check the **Markdown output** to fine-tune your splitting logic.

## AI Tool Usage  
### Using a separate tool with a cheaper model for simple use cases  

In this workflow, we combine different tools and models to balance **cost** and **performance**:  

* **Knowledge Tool** ‚Üí Uses Pinecone vector search to fetch relevant website/FAQ content.  
* **Billing Tool** ‚Üí Queries Airtable for live billing/payment details.  
* **Cheaper Chat Model (e.g., OpenRouter o4-mini)** ‚Üí Handles simpler queries (like small talk or direct lookups) at a lower cost.  
* **Premium Chat Model (e.g., OpenAI GPT-4o-mini)** ‚Üí Handles more complex reasoning or nuanced customer support.  

---

### Why use this approach?  
* **Cost optimization** ‚Üí Simple queries don‚Äôt always need the most powerful model.  
* **Scalability** ‚Üí Split responsibilities across tools and models for efficiency.  
* **Flexibility** ‚Üí You can add/remove tools as business needs change.  

---

### How to customize  
* Map **specific queries** (e.g., billing-related vs. knowledge lookups) to different tools.  
* Experiment with **smaller/cheaper models** for lightweight tasks.  
* Keep **complex reasoning** tasks for more advanced models.

Replace the sample website URL in the **HTTP Request** node with your own domain or content source. 

For this template I am using : https://content.eirevo.ie/billing-change-faqs

sample airtable record : https://airtable.com/app7MGZeNugq1poRI/shrciMZuk1dao46uo

* Use Airtable table **Payments** with columns:

Name, Payment Date, Amount Paid, Payment Method, Payment Confirmation Photo, Invoice, Customer, Billing Account, Notes, Invoice Amount Due, Invoice Status, Payment vs Invoice Difference, Is Full Payment?, Customer Account Status, Payment Summary (AI), Payment Risk Assessment (AI).

options.systemMessage:
Use Airtable table Payments with columns:
Name, Payment Date, Amount Paid, Payment Method, Payment Confirmation Photo, Invoice, Customer, Billing Account, Notes, Invoice Amount Due, Invoice Status, Payment vs Invoice Difference, Is Full Payment?, Customer Account Status, Payment Summary (AI), Payment Risk Assessment (AI).

parameters.content:
## Normalized Content

* Removes noise
* Reduces duplication
* Improves retrieval quality 
* Preserves context 
* Consistent format 
* Prevents wasted tokens 

**Note : Update the code based in your requirement**

With extensive experience in designing and implementing scalable software solutions, I focus on leveraging artificial intelligence to solve real-world problems. I enjoy exploring innovative applications of AI, from intelligent automation to data-driven insights, and I‚Äôm dedicated to building systems that are both efficient and impactful.
